qualifiers.scope: Applicable to lots large enough to accommodate a 2nd dwelling unit while maintaining low density appropriate for single-family neighborhoods.

variables.material: Must be architecturally compatible with main dwelling (for detached units)
variables.environmental: Must be located within the setbacks like the main dwelling

constants.specs: Must comply with all regulations applying to the main dwelling except as specified
constants.standards: Counts towards total FAR for the lot
constants.procedures: Parking for 2nd dwelling units is treated the same as parking for the main residence

mandatory: Lot size must meet minimum for zone
Must have two parking spaces (one to be covered)
Must be located within the setbacks like the main dwelling
conditional_logic: Except on corner lots, entrance way shall not face same lot line as entrance to main dwelling
Exterior staircases to 2nd floor units shall be located toward interior side or rear yard
dependencies: Parking for the 2nd dwelling unit may be combined with parking for the main residence

relationships.hierarchical: 2nd dwelling units are subordinate to the main dwelling
cross_references: See Table 5 for minimum lot size by zone
See Figure 41 on p. 45 for setback details
See Figure 23 C & D for parking details
relationships.logical_dependencies: Must be architecturally compatible with main dwelling (for detached units)
